snippet: FIFA’s executive committee set the date for the 2022 final in Qatar as Dec. 18, pushing the start of the tournament to mid-November.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; FIFA sets date for 2022 World Cup final in Qatar, confirming that tournament will be held in winter.
lead_paragraph: FIFA’s executive committee set the date for the 2022 final in Qatar as Dec. 18, pushing the start of the tournament to mid-November.

headline.main: FIFA Confirms Winter World Cup for 2022
headline.print_headline: ’22 World Cup in Qatar Is Shifted to December
